column6: Her name was Wu Ao-Shi, and she was known as the Pirate Queen of Pinghai Bay...and that all came after she left K'un-Lun and took the power of the Iron Fist with her. This is the story of Wu Ao-Shi, from the moment she became the first woman to touch the heart of Shou-Lao the Undying, to her mysterious, controversial and epic ending.
column7: | Iron Fist (Wu Ao-Shi) | Lei Kung, The Thunderer
column8: | writer:Ed Brubaker | writer:Matt Fraction | penciller:Travel Foreman | colorist:Matt Hollingsworth
